storyInfo: Elysium discusses a traditional Yan festival with Purestream, and the two bump into Absinthe seeking weapon maintenance advice from Thorns. During the conversation, Elysium recalls his homeland.

attributes.content: We spend our entire lives flying. Has anyone ever stopped to wonder where we will end up?
The humid breeze from back home, and the saline taste it leaves in the mouth.
The scorching sun, the unbearably high temperatures, the marks the hustle and bustle leave behind on the skin, and the air currents that gather in the open, spacious city.
I've experienced it. I've experienced it all.
Maybe someday I will make it back to that place.
10:10 A.M. \ Clear
Rhodes Island Landship, Cabin No. 2, Operator Rest Area
Okay, it's up to you to let everybody else know, Mr. Elysium!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: I've already talked to the Logistics Department about the ingredients we need, and I'll figure out the menu with FEater.
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: We should be able to make most homemade fare ourselves, but we'll need help with the more complicated dishes...
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Oh, right! Leizi said she could help us write the invitations. Her handwriting is pretty, and her stroke movements are so beautiful and swift. Just watching her write makes me want to learn calligraphy!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Well, you certainly have everything in order. I didn't expect Miss Leizi to offer her help.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: We need to contact the Yan and Lungmen operators on this list who are currently out in the field, correct? Just leave it to me. I'll get every last one of them!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I'm so glad you're helping us, Mr. Elysium.
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: I didn't expect there to be so many people from the old country here at Rhodes Island. Hehe, I really love that feeling of everyone coming together. It makes everything so lively, having so many people in one place.
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: I wonder if the people out there right now will make it back on time, though... I really hope they do... Hm, I guess it's probably going to be difficult, but there's always a chance!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Oh, of course, we welcome everyone! Would you like to join us, Mr. Elysium? You can bring your friends with you, too. The more the merrier!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Really? That's wonderful. I'll bring as many as I can. This is an opportunity not to be missed.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: The more the merrier, right? That's what we're good at!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Ahaha... of course, we welcome all of you, but please don't go overboard, either. Dr. Kal'tsit would probably yell at us.
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Don't worry. I know our limits.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: If you're afraid of getting yelled at, you'd better not invite this guy.
If courting disaster a talent, then he is the most talented person I've ever seen.
Oh, Mr. Thorns, good morning!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Morning.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Oh, come now. We both know you aren't much better than me when it comes to courting disaster.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Do remember who it was that wrecked the steel plates in the connect area last time! Why did I have to bear the brunt of Miss Closure's tirade?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: How would I know?
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Wasn't it because you brought her little robot up to the deck and it shattered to pieces?
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Th-That wasn't my fault! Andreana was shooting her inkballs there. She caught me off guard, and that's how the thing slipped out of my hand!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Eh? Wait a minute, why would Miss Andreana do something like that on the deck? She doesn't seem like the kind of person who would do that...
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: She was trying out her crossbow. I added something to emulate the feeling of shooting a Laterano gun.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: So it was your fault after all! No wonder that gun nut was so excited!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: What's wrong... Huh? Who's there?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Oh! Sinthe!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Why are you hiding over there? Come here!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Oh, are you afraid of these two? It's okay, don't be shy! They aren't scary. Besides, I'm here!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Um, Purestream, don't pull on my sleeve... I'm coming.
attributes.name: Absinthe

attributes.content: ...Sorry, am I interrupting? There's something I wanted to talk to Mr. Thorns about. If it isn't a good time right now, I can come back later...
attributes.name: Absinthe

attributes.content: Not at all. We're all coworkers. There is no need to be so formal.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: She's here for you.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I certainly didn't expect a girl to willingly talk to you, with that poker face of yours. This really puts my mind at ease.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: ...It's none of your business.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: What is it that you need?
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Right. I'm sorry to bother you right now, Mr. Thorns.
attributes.name: Absinthe

attributes.content: There's something I wanted to ask you about maintaining my weapon...
attributes.name: Absinthe

attributes.content: Hm, interesting. Is this guy known for maintaining his weapons?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Now that you mention it, it's about time I get my communicator fixed.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Tell me, do you think Miss Closure will forgive me and make some enhancements to my communicator if I bring her a present after my next mission?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: If you bring her something garlic flavored, I can guarantee you she won't.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Did you bring your weapon? Let me take a look.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Thank you! It's right here.
attributes.name: Absinthe

attributes.content: My weapon's Arts Unit is a little different compared to what other casters use. It's a little more complicated to maintain the parts inside... Oh, please be careful. The trigger is kind of loose.
attributes.name: Absinthe

attributes.content: It's old.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Is this the kind of Arts Unit they use in Ursus?
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: ...Yes. It belonged to my father.
attributes.name: Absinthe

attributes.content: I asked Old Mr. Hellagur about it, and he told me to take good care of the staff, otherwise it could affect its performance in the future.
attributes.name: Absinthe

attributes.content: He also told me you can mix good reagents for weapon maintenance.
attributes.name: Absinthe

attributes.content: And, um... I'm very sorry to ask you this out of the blue, but if it's okay with you, could youâ€”
attributes.name: Absinthe

attributes.content: Very well.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Could you please help me... huh?
attributes.name: Absinthe

attributes.content: Yes, I will help you.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: I've actually just come up with a new idea. If you can trust me with your weapon, I can give it a try.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Eh, um, y-yes.  T-Thank you.
attributes.name: Absinthe

attributes.content: Isn't that great, Sinthe?
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: You'd better not test anything weird on her weapon. I'm not doubting the effectiveness of your reagents, but every time you make something new, they always turn out pretty weird.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: It'll be fine this time.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: How can you be so sure?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I've already tested it on your weapon.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Huh? Ahhhh!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I'm just kidding.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Are they always like this...? They seem to get along really well.
attributes.name: Absinthe

attributes.content: Yeah, they're both from Iberia. Iberian operators are pretty much all really good friends.
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: It's a wonderful feeling to meet people from back home when you are so far away.
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: I was very happy when Miss FEater, the famous movie star, gave me her autograph! She's a huge celebrity where I'm from, and all of my friends and neighbors love her!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: And now we're so close that we go shopping together!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Oh, right, and Miss Leizi too. She may look scary, but she's actually a really nice person.
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Have you seen what she does to broken video monitors? She just whacks them like this. I thought that'd break them, but that's how she fixes them!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Isn't that how you fix electronics? You just need to hit them when they aren't working well.
attributes.name: Absinthe

attributes.content: That's true. Everyone back home does that. It works like a charm.
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Yep. If it doesn't work, whack it a few more times.
attributes.name: Absinthe

attributes.content: Yep, exactly!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: I see, so they are old friends back home.
attributes.name: Absinthe

attributes.content: Oh, cheer up. Don't look like that!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: I know, you're thinking about Zima, Leto, and the others, right?
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: I'll come with you next time. I'm friends with Leto. You two will hit it off right away! Once you get to know each other, it'll be much easier to talk to them.
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: ...Yeah. I hope so too. I'll have to talk to them sooner or later...
attributes.name: Absinthe

attributes.content: Thanks, Purestream.
attributes.name: Absinthe

attributes.content: Oh... You don't have to thank me. It makes me embarrassed.
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Ah, what a wonderful display of friendship. Dazzling, don't you agree? I love seeing these situations play out before my eyes.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: This reminds me of how shy I used to be when I first got here...
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Are you sure you were ever shy?
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Of course I was! Stop ruining my moment!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Even I need time to ease into things. Besides, Rhodes Island used to be a very different place. We didn't have that many people on board, and everyone was a lot more serious than they are now.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Eh, really? I can see Dr. Kal'tsit being strict. She still is. But how about everyone else? How was Miss Closure? And what about Amiya?
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Well, you know how Dr. Kal'tsit is. As for Miss Closure, since she was always busy, we rarely ever got a glimpse of her. She only slowed down a little after she got everything on the ship in order, before getting busy again with her robots.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Hm... Let's see. It was about two years ago when I first got here.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Amiya was still a kid back then. She was a bit shorter, like a sprout.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Haha, I have to say. She still isn't quite an adult, even though her expression is a lot different now.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: What was the Doctor like two years ago?
attributes.name: Absinthe

attributes.content: Eh, was the Doctor here too?
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: I believe the Doctor joined shortly before we did.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Really? But I thought the Doctor was one of the founders of Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Absinthe

attributes.content: Well... that's a tough question to answer.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: To tell you the truth, I'm not entirely sure what happened myself. I think something happened to the Doctor before I got here, and not many people know about it. The captain wouldn't tell me about it, either.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Anyway, I never met the Doctor until everything that went down in Lungmen. Ace certainly did raise the topic from time to time, though.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: In any case, I'd say the way things are now isn't too bad. Amiya, Dr. Kal'tsit, and the Doctor all get along with each other, and we're bringing in more and more operators. Things are going to get even busier here.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: From that point of view, I think I made the right decision when I decided to stay. I've had my fill of gloomy, boring places.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I may not be a Messenger, but I still get the chance to travel to different places, see different sights, and have a place to call home. That's more than enough for me.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Speaking of which, have you been back since you left?
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Where?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Iberia.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Not even once!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Even if we wanted to go back... it's not quite possible, is it?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Both of you are from Iberia, right?
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: I haven't heard much about that place. What is it like? If you can't go back, don't you miss home?
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Nope.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Uh, well, I guess I do miss Iberia a little.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Oh, I'm sorry, I guess I shouldn't have asked.
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: No, it's not really a big deal. It's just, how should I say this? Yeah, there's not really much worthy of mention there, now that I think about it.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Oh, don't look like that. It's not as if I have any painful memories of the place, but... yeah, Iberia was pretty boring for me.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Even though it's your homeland...?
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Yeah, it's boring. It's depressing to no end.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I couldn't live there, and so I left. That's all there is to it. Aside from that, I guess it wasn't so bad.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: That's what you think.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: To us Ã†girians, Iberia isn't a very friendly place.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Oh... I've heard a little about that, but I don't know much about it. There weren't a lot of Ã†girians where I lived, after all.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Most Ã†girians lived on the streets in the city outskirts or stuck it out near the blockade line until the Inquisition went after them. Very few of us were lucky enough to live a peaceful life.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: The Inquisition rounded up a lot of people. People that they deemed threats, and rightfully so.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Um, are you sure?
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: That sounds kinda scary. If I remember correctly, you're an Ã†girian too, aren't you, Purestream?
attributes.name: Absinthe

attributes.content: Yeah, but there are people of all races in Yan, so no one seemed to mind. I haven't heard of Ã†girians being barred from any official positions, either. Everyone's equal.
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Now that I think about it, Rhodes Island doesn't care much about races, either. When I first got here, everyone really took good care of me. Just like Mr. Elysium! He helped me out on my first field mission!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Me too. On my last mission, some enemies got the drop on me. It's all thanks to Mr. Elysium that I'm still here... Thank you very much.
attributes.name: Absinthe

attributes.content: Oh, no need to thank me. I get reassigned to different teams pretty often. We're all teammates, so we should help each other out.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Even so, I must still thank you for your kindness.
attributes.name: Absinthe

attributes.content: Absinthe, you're always so stubborn when it comes to these things. I have way too many people around me like that...
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Such as that captain of yours?
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Yes, she's one of those people, but have you ever noticed you're very stubborn yourself?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: The captain doesn't talk much, but she looks so cool... and I'm a little embarrassed to say this, but I'm actually a little scared of her.
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: I get it, I get it. She does look very scary.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: But, you know, she just looks scary and doesn't try to talk to others much. She's actually very easy to talk to.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: The next time you see her, maybe you should try saying hi to her. She may not look it, but it'll make her really happy. I guarantee it.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: It sounds like you two really get along.
attributes.name: Absinthe

attributes.content: Well, I guess we kind of do... After all, she was the one who saved my life.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Besides, she can't get by without my help. If it wasn't for that, I would've been a Messenger, traveling all around the world right now.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Haha, being popular has its own set of problems.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I seem to remember she's on a solo mission right now?
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: And you're saying she can't get by without your help?
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: ...This mission's different! Only she alone could handle such an infiltration mission. I'd just blow her cover.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I don't think she has ever teamed up with anyone before me, right? It was pretty terrible at first. She even used to beat me up just because she thought I was annoying. Don't you think that's cruel?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Her Arts are really something else. I took a single blow and it knocked me out of my senses so terribly that I didn't even know how to get home. It took me a while until I remembered who I was!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: It affected your consciousness... and memories? I didn't know Arts could be so dangerous.
attributes.name: Absinthe

attributes.content: And that someone here at Rhodes Island has Arts like that...
attributes.name: Absinthe

attributes.content: Uh, yeah, it's not something we talk about often. It's technically classified information, so don't tell anyone else, okay?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Anyway, you should try to be more casual. We all get along with each other here. If there's anything you don't understand, come find me. I'll be happy to help you.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: More or less what he just said.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: You don't need to force yourself, though. Just go on at your own pace. Anyone will be happy to help you should you run into any problems.
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: ...Thanks.
attributes.name: Absinthe

attributes.content: Yep, that's right. Don't push yourself too hard!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Oh, perfect! Sinthe, why don't you come to our party? You two as well, Mr. Elysium, Mr. Thorns. I'll be making lots of food from back home!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: The festival only happens once a year. Be sure to eat your fill!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: Well! That certainly gives me something to look forward to!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Hehe, and do look forward to it. I promise you won't be disappointed~!
attributes.name: Purestream

attributes.content: A city in gray, drab colors. Depressing. Boring. Is that all?
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Is that how you see that place?
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Well... my situation isn't quite like yours.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I really don't have much to say about that place. It was a simple and boring place to me, and that really is it for me.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Besides, I couldn't possibly have gone into the details. One of them is still a child.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Don't tell me you've forgotten.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: The girl is still a student, and she's in a pretty cheerful mood because of the festival coming up. Let's not dampen her spirits.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Home... huh? I wonder what it's like now.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I wonder if it's still packed with buildings, and the wind is still so humid, with that salty scent to it? Are the streets there still empty, and everyone there's as quiet as they've always been?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Who are you asking? How would I know?
attributes.name: Thorns

attributes.content: Haha, you're right.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Tell me, brother, do you think we'll ever have a chance to go back, having run away from that place?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I don't think I want to go back.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: But I can't help but think that, perhaps one day... I'll go back.
attributes.name: Elysium
